baseURL: "https://kpi0.github.io/" # 博客部署网址 title: KPI0's Blog # 网站标题(中间+底部) languageCode: zh-cn # en-us paginate: 10 # 默认每页列表显示的文章数目 theme: PaperMod # 主题名字，和themes文件夹下的一致 enableEmoji: true # 允许使用 Emoji 表情 enableRobotsTXT: true # 允许爬虫抓取到搜索引擎 buildDrafts: false # 构建时包含草稿 buildFuture: false # 构建时包含未来的内容 buildExpired: false # 构建时包含已过期的内容 hasCJKLanguage: true # 自动检测是否包含 中文日文韩文 如果文章中使用了很多中文引号的话可以开启 hideFooter: false # 隐藏页脚 ShowLastMod: true # 显示文章更新时间 ShowToc: true # 显示目录 TocOpen: false # 自动展开目录 defaultContentLanguage: zh # 最顶部首先展示的语言页面 defaultContentLanguageInSubdir: true googleAnalytics: UA-123-45 # 谷歌统计 permalinks: # 浏览器链接显示方式 post: "/:title/" # post: "/:year/:month/:day/:title/" minify: disableXML: true # minifyOutput: true params: env: production # to enable google analytics, opengraph, twitter-cards and schema. # title: ExampleSite # 设置标题 # description: "个人网站" # 设置站点描述 keywords: [Blog, Portfolio, PaperMod] author: KPI0 # 显示多个作者 # author: ["Me", "You"] # multiple authors images: ["images/who.png"] DateFormat: "2001-01-01" # 网站中日期字符串的格式 defaultTheme: auto # 设置默认主题dark, light disableThemeToggle: false # 禁用标签旁边显示的主题切换图标 # 评论系统配置 twikoo: version: 1.6.7 # twikoo插件版本号 id: https://xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx # 填写自己的id region: ap-shanghai # 默认即可 mainSections: - {{- define "main" }}<header class="page-header"><h1>{{- (printf "%s&nbsp;" .Title ) | htmlUnescape -}}<!-- <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="28" height="28" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none"stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><circle cx="11" cy="11" r="8"></circle><line x1="21" y1="21" x2="16.65" y2="16.65"></line></svg> --></h1>{{- if .Description }}<div class="post-description">{{ .Description }}</div>{{- end }}{{- if not (.Param "hideMeta") }}<div class="post-meta">{{- partial "translation_list.html" . -}}</div>{{- end }}</header><div id="searchbox"><input id="searchInput" autofocus placeholder="{{ .Params.placeholder | default (printf "%s ↵" .Title) }}"aria-label="search" type="search" autocomplete="off"><ul id="searchResults" aria-label="search results"></ul></div>{{- end }}{{/* end main */}}
